lyrics:
19 contributorsphotograph lyricsverse 1
if you want it oohoohooh you can have it oohoohooh
but youve gotta learn to reach out there and grab it oohoohooh

prechorus 1
cause everybody wants some love oh baby
shootin from the stars above oh baby
and though my heart will break theres more that i could take
i could never get enough

verse 2
if you need it oohoohooh you should show it oohoohooh
cause you might play so monastic that you blow it oohoohooh

prechorus 2
cause everybody wants some hope oh baby
something they can barely know oh baby
and though my heart will break theres more that i could take
i could never let it go

chorus
its in the photograph
its in the photograph
its in the photograph of love

guitar solo
see weezer liveget tickets as low as 225you might also likeprechorus 3
cause everybody wants a dream oh baby
something they can barely see oh baby
and though my heart will break theres more that i could take
i could never let it be

chorus
its in the photograph
its in the photograph
its in the photograph of love

outro
if you blew it oohoohooh dont reject it oohoohooh
just sit drawin up the plans and reerect it oohoohooh
just sit drawin up the plans and reerect it oohoohooh
just sit drawin up the plans and reerect it oohoohooh2embed
